sentences: Oled sa arvutiga sina peal 'oskad' sa h채sti arvutit kasutada?
Kas sa osad eesti keelt r채채kida?
Oskad sa aidata mind selle 체lesannega?
context: 'Oskad' is the second-person singular present indicative form of the verb 'oskama' in Estonian. It means 'you can', 'you are able to', or 'you know how to'. This word is used when asking someone about their abilities or skills, similar to English 'can you' questions.
